products.title: Trezor Model T
products.description: The Trezor Model T is an advanced cryptocurrency hardware wallet. Store Bitcoin, passwords, tokens and other keys with confidence. Invented for your digital independence.

products.title: Trezor Model One
products.description: The Trezor Model One is the most secure hardware wallet choice for everyone, whether you're new to Bitcoin or already an expert.

products.title: Trezor Model One(white)
products.description: The Trezor Model One is the most secure hardware wallet choice for everyone, whether you're new to Bitcoin or already an expert.

products.title: Extended USB-C cable
products.description: Extra long Type-A to Type-C cable for convenient connection of Trezor to a computer. 1.8 m. 70.8 inch.

products.title: Cryptosteel Cassette
products.description: The Cryptosteel Cassette is designed to securely store recovery seeds and other alphanumeric data up to 96 characters long. It's the perfect pocket-sized stainless steel offline backup tool.

products.title: Silicone case for Trezor Model T
products.description: Personalize and protect your Trezor Model T hardware wallet with this stylish black silicone case cover.

products.title: InCharge Ultra Portable Cable USB-C
products.description: Small, tangle-free charging/sync cable. Measures only 1.5 inches/3,8 cm and snaps onto your keyring with a strong magnet. Take it with you and connect your Trezor anywhere.

products.title: Premium Adjustable Trezor Lanyard
products.description: Hang on to your bitcoin wallet wherever you go, with this premium adjustable Traffic Green lanyard for the Trezor Model One hardware wallet and Trezor Model T silicone case.

products.title: Ledger Nano X
products.description: The next level hardware wallet. Buy & Securely manage your crypto in one single-app, anywhere you go. Become the only one in charge of your assets.

products.title: Ledger Nano S
products.description: The original hardware wallet. Easily start your crypto journey: buy crypto, secure your assets and manage them in one single-app.

products.title: Ledger OTG Kit
products.description: All the cables and adapters you need to connect your hardware wallet to your Android phone or laptop.
